gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 130, Hornets 117
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeated the Hornets, 130-117. Cole Anthony recorded 30 points, seven rebounds, and seven assists for the Magic, with Franz Wagner (30 points, seven rebounds) and Paolo Banchero (23 points, seven rebounds) combined for 53 points in the victory. Miles Bridges tallied 23 points and 10 rebounds for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Magic are winners of seven in a row and improve to 12-5 in the regular season, while the Hornets fall to 5-10.
